summary: Frontend-only testing of Admin Dashboard zero-loader performance overhaul. All 6 key pages tested (Dashboard, Analytics, Categories, Listings, Config Manager, SEO Tools) render instantly without blocking CircularProgress spinners. Cache-first pattern with LinearProgress successfully implemented.

notes.issue: Recharts warning: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - chart dimensions not set during initial render

notes.reason: CircularProgress only used in button loading states - acceptable UX pattern

admin_login.description: Admin login works with admin@marketplace.com / Admin@123456

dashboard_overview_zero_loader.description: Dashboard Overview renders immediately with data, no blocking CircularProgress

analytics_page_zero_loader.description: Analytics page shows KPI cards and charts immediately using cache-first pattern

categories_page_zero_loader.description: Categories page renders category list immediately, no blocking spinner

listings_page_zero_loader.description: Listings page shows table with data immediately, no blocking spinner

config_manager_zero_loader.description: Config Manager shows platform settings immediately, no blocking spinner

seo_tools_zero_loader.description: SEO Tools page renders AI SEO generator and tabs immediately, no blocking spinner

linear_progress_indicator.description: LinearProgress used correctly as non-blocking background fetch indicator on all pages

dashboard_page.pattern: Cache-first with getCachedData() hook and isFetchingInBackground state

analytics_page.spinner: LinearProgress for background fetch, CircularProgress only in Save button

listings_page.spinner: LinearProgress for fetch, CircularProgress only in Save button

config_manager_page.spinner: CircularProgress only in dialog action buttons

seo_tools_page.pattern: Cache-first with getCachedData() for meta/global/sitemap data
seo_tools_page.spinner: LinearProgress for background fetch, CircularProgress only in AI generation button

critical_code_review_comments: Zero-loader implementation verified on all 6 target pages
Cache-first pattern using getCachedData() from useCacheFirst hook working correctly
LinearProgress used consistently as non-blocking background fetch indicator
CircularProgress only remains in button loading states and dialog actions - acceptable UX
context_for_next_testing_agent: Zero-loader performance overhaul testing complete. All admin dashboard pages render instantly using cache-first pattern with LinearProgress. No blocking CircularProgress spinners on page load. CircularProgress only used in button loading states which is acceptable.
